title: Resolutions memorializing the Congress of the United States to declare the city of Quincy as the most patriotic city in America

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Ayers of Quincy, a petition (accompanied by resolutions, House, No. 3828) of Bruce J. Ayers for the adoption of resolutions memorializing the Congress of the United States to declare the city of Quincy as the most patriotic city in America.  Veterans and Federal Affairs.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Veterans and Federal Affairs

related_entities.name: committee on Veterans and Federal Affairs

actions.description: Hearing scheduled for 09/30/2025 from 01:00 PM-05:00 PM in A-1

Hearing rescheduled to 09/30/2025 from 01:00 PM-02:50 PM in A-1                                                                                                                   and Virtual Hearing updated to New End Time
